page.title: 05Motor Museum
page.content: Today Stanmore hall is a motor museum, started by two men:Bob Roberts and Mike Barker,who needed money to run their rally car.The museum has a Porshe 917 which can go over 200M.P.H. the same car apeared in the film 'Le Mans'starring Paul Newman.The oldest car in the museum is a 1913 Hispano Suiza and the newest car is a 1980 Vauxall Chevette rally car which Russell Brookes drove in the Lombard Rally. The most valuable car is a Napier Railton.This car is the only one made of its kind, and is worth over half a million pounds, it was owned by John Cobb. As time goes by it is very likley that the museum will grow in importance.
